wikipedia_page.main: Ivor Ronald John Brown (born 1 April 1888 in Shardlow – died 1966) was a professional footballer who played for Tottenham Hotspur, Coventry City, Reading and Swansea Town.

response: Ivor Brown was a British journalist.

*Ivor Brown (footballer) (1888–1966), footballer for Tottenham Hotspur, Coventry City, Reading and Swansea Town
